English: phases of moon, namely: new moon `朔~[shuo4], first quarter or waxing moon `上弦~[shang4 xian2], full moon `望~[wang4] and last quarter or waning moon `下弦~[xia4 xian2]
phases of moon, namely: new moon `朔~[shuo4], first quarter or waxing moon `上弦~[shang4 xian2], full moon `望~[wang4] and last quarter or waning moon `下弦~[xia4 xian2]
